generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wet, paved surface with visible tire marks and reflections of lights, indicating it is a road where vehicles are driving.
- sidewalk: A dark, elevated area with a curb is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the road, which is consistent with a sidewalk.
- building: Structures with closed metal shutters and signs are visible along the right side of the road, indicating buildings.
- pole: Vertical poles are visible along the sidewalk, supporting signs and traffic lights.
- traffic light: A green traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A rectangular sign with text is visible on a pole, indicating a traffic sign.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including one in the foreground and others in the distance.
- truck: A white van, which is a type of truck, is visible in the distance on the road.
- bus: A green and white bus is visible in the distance on the road.
